description: Solarvista Live is a Field Service Management platform to manage, plan, and mobilise your engineers.
label: Solarvista Live
name: solarvista

settings.name: datasources
settings.label: Datasources
settings.description: The Datasources to sync from Solarvista. Leave list blank to use the default list of Datasources.

settings.name: account
settings.label: Account
settings.description: The AccountId for your Solarvista account.

settings.name: clientId
settings.label: Client ID
settings.description: Your Solarvista Client ID to create your access token and credentials.

settings.name: code
settings.label: Code
settings.description: Your API authorization code retrieved using your account id, client id, and access token.

settings.name: start_date
settings.label: Start Date
settings.description: Determines how much historical data will be extracted. Please be aware that the larger the time period and amount of data, the longer the initial extraction can be expected to take.
